name: Dragon Dance (Wardius, Thammembaum, TheColouredMan, SunKnut)
description:
Dragon Dance is an endless runner (or flyer) in which you play as a dragon.  

Try to press the right buttons at the right time to fly as far as you can. 

But be careful! It gets more difficult over time.

Can you score more points than your friends?

It was made in a week for the htk Summer Game Jam 2021.

Programming - Marvin Wardius

Music & Sounds - Knut Otto Preul

PixelArt - Lara Thamm

UI Design - Pascâl Nagler
